Text: Thank You, Thank You, Thank You!!!
Thank you so much for making this series available.  I am a huge Caps fan and I wouldn't have gotten to see it otherwise.  I've really enjoyed it.  Thank you, thank you, thank you.
This plays fine in VLC player, but quicktime gives an error for some reason: Error 2002: bad public movie atom.  Anybody know what that means?
Convert using Freemake video converter, then they work fine in quicktime.  Not sure why they dont to begin with.
